description: Demo dataset for early_evals batch runs. 50 seed inputs across various domains.

inputs.goal: log in securely using my email and password
inputs.benefit: access my personalized dashboard and data

inputs.goal: create an account with my email address
inputs.benefit: start using the platform and save my preferences

inputs.goal: reset my password via email
inputs.benefit: regain access to my account without contacting support

inputs.goal: enable two-factor authentication on my account
inputs.benefit: protect my account from unauthorized access

inputs.goal: log in using my company's SSO provider
inputs.benefit: use a single set of credentials across all work tools

inputs.goal: log out from all devices
inputs.benefit: ensure no one else can access my account

inputs.goal: stay logged in across browser sessions
inputs.benefit: avoid re-entering credentials every time I visit

inputs.goal: unlock a user account after too many failed login attempts
inputs.benefit: help users regain access without compromising security

inputs.goal: add items to my shopping cart
inputs.benefit: collect products before purchasing

inputs.goal: complete checkout with my saved payment method
inputs.benefit: purchase items quickly without re-entering card details

inputs.goal: apply a discount coupon to my order
inputs.benefit: save money on my purchase

inputs.goal: track the delivery status of my order
inputs.benefit: know when to expect my package

inputs.goal: request a refund for a defective product
inputs.benefit: get my money back without hassle

inputs.goal: save products to a wishlist
inputs.benefit: remember items I want to buy later

inputs.goal: search for products by keyword and category
inputs.benefit: quickly find what I'm looking for

inputs.goal: leave a review and rating for a purchased product
inputs.benefit: share my experience with other buyers

inputs.goal: update product inventory levels
inputs.benefit: prevent overselling and stockouts

inputs.goal: view prices in my local currency
inputs.benefit: understand costs without manual conversion

inputs.goal: upload documents and images to the platform
inputs.benefit: store and share my files with collaborators

inputs.goal: edit a document collaboratively in real-time
inputs.benefit: work together with teammates without version conflicts

inputs.goal: share a file with specific colleagues
inputs.benefit: control who has access to sensitive content

inputs.goal: view previous versions of my document
inputs.benefit: revert to earlier drafts if needed

inputs.goal: search across all my files by content
inputs.benefit: find information quickly without browsing folders

inputs.goal: tag and categorize my files
inputs.benefit: keep content organized and easy to filter

inputs.goal: archive old files without deleting them
inputs.benefit: reduce clutter while preserving historical content

inputs.goal: set retention policies on documents
inputs.benefit: automatically manage document lifecycle for compliance

inputs.goal: receive email notifications for important updates
inputs.benefit: stay informed without constantly checking the app

inputs.goal: receive push notifications on my phone
inputs.benefit: get instant alerts for time-sensitive events

inputs.goal: customize my notification preferences
inputs.benefit: only receive alerts that matter to me

inputs.goal: view my notification history
inputs.benefit: catch up on alerts I may have missed

inputs.goal: receive digest emails instead of individual notifications
inputs.benefit: reduce inbox clutter while staying informed

inputs.goal: unsubscribe from all marketing emails
inputs.benefit: stop receiving unwanted communications

inputs.goal: view a dashboard of key metrics
inputs.benefit: monitor business performance at a glance

inputs.goal: generate a monthly performance report
inputs.benefit: share insights with stakeholders

inputs.goal: export analytics data to CSV
inputs.benefit: perform custom analysis in external tools

inputs.goal: view real-time metrics on a live dashboard
inputs.benefit: respond quickly to emerging issues

inputs.goal: compare metrics across different time periods
inputs.benefit: identify trends and measure growth

inputs.goal: schedule automated reports to be emailed weekly
inputs.benefit: receive regular updates without manual effort

inputs.goal: update my profile information
inputs.benefit: keep my details current and accurate

inputs.goal: assign roles and permissions to users
inputs.benefit: control access to features based on responsibility

inputs.goal: invite new members to my team
inputs.benefit: onboard colleagues quickly

inputs.goal: manage multiple teams within my organization
inputs.benefit: organize users by department or project

inputs.goal: delete my account and all associated data
inputs.benefit: exercise my right to be forgotten

inputs.goal: view an audit log of user actions
inputs.benefit: track changes for security and compliance

inputs.goal: do something
inputs.benefit: achieve my goal

inputs.role: enterprise administrator responsible for managing a large-scale deployment across multiple geographic regions
inputs.goal: configure and deploy a comprehensive multi-tenant architecture that supports isolated data storage, custom branding per tenant, role-based access control with hierarchical permissions, and automated provisioning workflows
inputs.benefit: enable seamless onboarding of new enterprise clients while maintaining strict data isolation, compliance with regional data residency requirements, and operational efficiency at scale

inputs.goal: test input with "quotes" and 'apostrophes'
inputs.benefit: verify that special characters are handled safely

inputs.goal: buy a product and also return it simultaneously
inputs.benefit: test conflicting requirements

inputs.goal: perform an action without specifying who I am
inputs.benefit: handle missing role gracefully

inputs.goal: integrate with a third-party API
